name: hypha-rpc
description: Hypha RPC client for connecting to Hypha server for data management and AI model serving.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build-umd && BUILD_ESM=true  npm run build-umd
scripts.build-umd: webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode production --devtool source-map
scripts.publish-npm: npm install && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run start-hypha-server" "sleep 5 && karma start --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless,FirefoxHeadless karma.conf.js"
scripts.test-watch: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-hypha-server" "sleep 5 && karma start --auto-watch --browsers ChromeDebugging karma.conf.js --debug"

author: Wei Ouyang
